hudson.tasks.Shell.command: cd /home/ubuntu rm -rf eks-app-platform-config git clone https://github.com/nagarajui7/eks-app-platform-config.git cd eks-app-platform-config mkdir cluster_name_reg cd /home/ubuntu cp worker_nodes /home/ubuntu/eks-app-platform-config/cluster_name_reg cp cluster-info.json /home/ubuntu/eks-app-platform-config/cluster_name_reg cd eks-app-platform-config git add . git status git commit -m "files" git push origin master
